resources.string:
Hi, my name is Alexandre, 
 a Chemical Engineer graduated from Armando Alvares Penteado Foundation - FAAP. 

Today, I am looking for new opportunities of learning and professional growth by 
 migrating to IT area - full stack web developer. 

I have had the opportunity to produce manual instructions, step-by-step, of 
smartphones; and the developing and production of printing inks works according 
to the Brazilian laws. 

I am a committed, organized, methodical professional and ready for new challenges.
